NetworkLanguageModel

public NetworkLanguageModel(java.lang.String host,
                            int port,
                            java.net.URL location,
                            int maxDepth,
                            LogMath logMath)
Creates network language model client

Parameters:
host - server host
port - server port
location - URL of the file with vocabulary (only needed for 1-stage model)
maxDepth - depth of the model
logMath - logMath
